channel.title: AI on Uncombed Whiskers
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Uncombed Whiskers

item.title: Obsoletion by AI
item.description: There has been a trend over the last 5-10 years, where more and more money is being thrown at startups who claim (mistakenly) to be making software developers obsolete by use of AI. Of course, as a rule - generalizations are never accurate. However, in this case it’s a bit funny to watch certain valley tech incubators and fund houses keep throwing good money in this area.
